hint: Push selective filters (date_dim, state/country) into CTEs early, then use explicit joins to reduce the base fact table scan.
Isolate date_dim and key dimension filters into CTEs, then restructure joins to improve predicate pushdown and reduce intermediate row counts.
Materialize all pre-filtered dimension and fact subsets into separate CTEs, then join aggressively to minimize re-computation of OR conditions.
Transform the two OR clusters (demographic + price, address + profit) into separate UNION ALL branches to allow per-branch optimization and index usage.
